comment_16: Little known fact - this song's working title was "Bad Boy Bukkake". While Mariah was almost divorced from Mottola, she ate a bunch of ecstasy, and most of the Bad Boy Records lineup enjoyed a gang-bang with MC. The song mostly references how most of the guys were a bit "backed up" (coincidence?), thus affording all involved a "Honey"-like viscosity to their...well, "Honey", as well as North-like volume. The occasion also afforded MC a chance to compare with her ex, whose older loins could only, by the late 90s, produce man sauce whose color and consistency, according to Mariah, was more like Gulden's Mustard.
